about_the_game:
This faction flair pack adds new flavor to the dwarves of Joruvellir, who dwell in the harsh desert sands of their homelands. Splitting off from Modsognir's tribe, the Goldhoof clan embarked on a great migration. They went forth from Svarinshaug, travelled through the Aurvang swamplands, finally reaching the arid sands of Joruvellir, where they settled and gave rise to a myriad dwarven clans.

Features:
  • Joruvellir command panel interface
  • New graphics for Joruvellir Yale Pens
  • New portraits for Joruvellir Scouts, Pathfinders, Explorers, Yale Riders and Yale Lords
  • New basic shield icon for Joruvellir soldiers with the faction's symbol (also used for the Joruvellir Wooden Shield item)
  • Faction icons with Joruvellir's symbol, used in the faction foundation submenu
  • Dwarven Mead Hall, Bastion and Transport graphics containing the Joruvellir symbol

Graphics by João Victor G. Costa (Jinn) and Exidelo (Leo).
detailed_description:
This faction flair pack adds new flavor to the dwarves of Joruvellir, who dwell in the harsh desert sands of their homelands. Splitting off from Modsognir's tribe, the Goldhoof clan embarked on a great migration. They went forth from Svarinshaug, travelled through the Aurvang swamplands, finally reaching the arid sands of Joruvellir, where they settled and gave rise to a myriad dwarven clans.

Features:
  • Joruvellir command panel interface
  • New graphics for Joruvellir Yale Pens
  • New portraits for Joruvellir Scouts, Pathfinders, Explorers, Yale Riders and Yale Lords
  • New basic shield icon for Joruvellir soldiers with the faction's symbol (also used for the Joruvellir Wooden Shield item)
  • Faction icons with Joruvellir's symbol, used in the faction foundation submenu
  • Dwarven Mead Hall, Bastion and Transport graphics containing the Joruvellir symbol

Graphics by João Victor G. Costa (Jinn) and Exidelo (Leo).

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 LTS or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo (Merom) 1.66GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Graphics Media Accelerator 950 or equivalent
  • Storage: 230 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Any modern Linux distribution
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo (Penryn) 2.53 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Graphics Media Accelerator 4500MHD or equivalent
